title: A Stallion Called Golnar
description: The stallion’s life in the wild is peaceful, free from the ropes and fences of the humans. When a cruel, ruthless man with selfish desires forces him from his home and the herd he loves, the stallion is overcome with sorrow. Will things ever return to how they were before? Allison Paige always had a soft spot for horses. So when she finds a wild stallion being mistreated, she’s determined to save him. As their lives intertwine, Allison must help the horse before it’s too late...
author: Evelyn   Grace
